title: NDC PLUS and Legacy Database Schemas
description: Combined schema documentation for Legacy and NDC PLUS seismic monitoring systems

ndc_plus.description: NDC PLUS modern seismic monitoring database schema

CHANNEL_SEGMENT.description: Stores time series channel segment information for waveform data

CHANNEL_SEGMENT_CREATION.description: Tracks creation metadata for channel segments

CHANNEL_SEGMENT_PROC_MASK_XREF.description: Cross-reference between channel segments and processing masks

CHANNEL_SEGMENT_WAVEFORM.description: Links channel segments to waveform IDs

EVENT_CORRELATION_CHANNEL_SEGMENT.description: Channel segments used in event correlation

EVENT_HYPOTHESIS_TAG.description: Tags and classifications for event hypotheses

EVENT_STATUS_INFO.description: Status and workflow information for events

FEATURE_MEASUREMENT_ARRIVAL_TIME.description: Arrival time measurements for seismic phases

FEATURE_PREDICTION_ARRIVAL_TIME.description: Predicted arrival times for seismic phases

INTERVAL.description: Time intervals for processing and analysis

LOCATION_RESTRAINT.description: Constraints and restraints for location calculations

PROCESSING_MASK.description: Data quality masks and processing intervals

PROCESSING_MASK_QC_SEGMENT_VERSION.description: Links processing masks to QC segments

cross_schema_relationships.description: Legacy EVENT conceptually maps to NDC PLUS EVENT
Legacy ARRIVAL conceptually maps to NDC PLUS FEATURE_MEASUREMENT_ARRIVAL_TIME
Legacy AMPLITUDE conceptually maps to NDC PLUS FEATURE_MEASUREMENT_AMPLITUDE
Legacy ORIGIN conceptually maps to NDC PLUS LOCATION_SOLUTION
Legacy ASSOC conceptually maps to NDC PLUS SIGNAL_DETECTION_HYPOTHESIS
Legacy STAMAG conceptually maps to NDC PLUS STATION_MAGNITUDE_SOLUTION
Legacy NETMAG conceptually maps to NDC PLUS NETWORK_MAGNITUDE_SOLUTION
Legacy REMARK conceptually maps to NDC PLUS REMARK
